!Warehouse Freightman Cliff: I will arrange the numbers 1 through 9 on the panel. You choose 6 numbers between 1 and 9. We then see how if the numbers you selected form any horizontal, vertical or diagonal lines on the panel. If your numbers create 3 lines, you win.
